description.raw:
Without this change, it gives errors like the following:
~~~
/home/scpeters/bin/bb:33:in `+': can't convert nil into String (TypeError)
	from /home/scpeters/bin/bb:33:in `to_s'
	from /home/scpeters/bin/bb:75:in `block in listPullRequests'
	from /home/scpeters/bin/bb:75:in `each'
	from /home/scpeters/bin/bb:75:in `listPullRequests'
	from /home/scpeters/bin/bb:180:in `<main>'
~~~

Using the -v option, I was able to see that the json data structure had changed ("sha" -> "hash") and make this fix.

UPDATE:
They just changed the API again, so I fixed it again, but who knows what other changes they are going to make. If they make any more breaking changes before this gets merged, I'm going to decline this pull request and keep the fixes in a private branch until things stabilize a bit.

/home/scpeters/bin/bb:33:in `+': can't convert nil into String (TypeError)

    from /home/scpeters/bin/bb:75:in `block in listPullRequests'

    from /home/scpeters/bin/bb:75:in `listPullRequests'
    from /home/scpeters/bin/bb:180:in `<main>'

Using the -v option, I was able to see that the json data structure had changed ("sha" -> "hash") and make this fix.

UPDATE: They just changed the API again, so I fixed it again, but who knows what other changes they are going to make. If they make any more breaking changes before this gets merged, I'm going to decline this pull request and keep the fixes in a private branch until things stabilize a bit.
